channel.title: Drops
channel.description:
[code=abap]#torm demon 1155:45 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 1201:1 1289:1 1249:1 886:150 385:8 995:12300 565:15 560:30 2363:1 15030:1 15028:1 4087:1 11732:1 4087:1 11732:1 405:1 15027:1 4087:1 11732:1 11235:1 2366:1 1263:1 [/code]
hey guys that's my tormented demons drop, how to i make the drop rate easier for them to get, such as claws and other items? do i make 1155 lower, or do i make it higher?

item.title: Drops
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“matzie, post:11, topic:410115”]1155 is the item id like kalvin said, but 45 is the drop AMOUNT, not the percentage. as you wont have a 12300% chance of coins drop, that is an amount. i believe you must add more of the item to the list. such as 1155:45 should be replaced with 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45, 8x more likely to get that drop [24.32% chance overall to get that drop, 9/37 chance]

NOTE- chance of drop based on only values SUPPLIED by you.

EDIT-what is item 1155?[/quote]
Funny, a tormented demons drops bronze full helm

Read full topic

item.title: Drops
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

1155 is the item id like kalvin said, but 45 is the drop AMOUNT, not the percentage. as you wont have a 12300% chance of coins drop, that is an amount. i believe you must add more of the item to the list. such as 1155:45 should be replaced with 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45 1155:45, 8x more likely to get that drop [24.32% chance overall to get that drop, 9/37 chance]

NOTE- chance of drop based on only values SUPPLIED by you.

EDIT-what is item 1155?

Read full topic

item.title: Drops
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

I’m not so sure either but I think Kalvin may be right, test around with a different npc like Man or Goblin and make it drop whatever until your done testing, that always works for me

Read full topic

item.title: Drops
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

#torm demon 1155:45 892:42 1371:1 1373:1 1113:1 1319:1 1201:1 1289:1 1249:1 886:150 385:8 995:12300 565:15 560:30 2363:1 15030:1 15028:1 4087:1 11732:1 4087:1 11732:1 405:1 15027:1 4087:1 11732:1 11235:1 2366:1 1263:1

Example

(1155 = ItemID) (45 = Drop Percentage = 45% drop Rate)

So That means the ItemId of 1155 will have a 45% chance drop rate.

If you change

to

The ItemId 1155 will have a 10% drop rate

item.title: Drops
item.dc:creator: @Cali_Tree Cali Tree
item.description:
@Cali_Tree wrote:

^Wrong. The Number After the item code is HOW MUCH of the item you will get in the Chance of a drop.

Read full topic

item.title: Drops
item.dc:creator: @RyanHz RyanHz
item.description:
@RyanHz wrote:

the first number is the item number and the second one is within how many kills so for example

995:10 you will get item 995 which is coins within every 10 kills

Read full topic
